name: nonrandom
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
happening, done, or chosen according to a plan or system, rather than by chance: I believe that everything that happens to us is nonrandom. It was a non-random sample, using only people from the Bengali community.
More examplesFewer examplesThe studies that were recorded in the database were selected in a nonrandom fashion.Darwin could detect a nonrandom process that allowed some species to survive while others perished.We can analyse the algorithm to see why the results it gives us are non-random.
